tag_list: daily-deal-credit-card-processing, payment-processing, merchant-services, direct-merchant-accounts, global-payment-processing, payments-consulting
overview:
Patricia Bachkoff Weber has gained a reputation as a leading authority on card-not-present payment processing. Her experience in the online payments industry goes back to almost Day 1 of e-commerce transaction processing. Since 1998, she has helped start-up technology firms select and integrate scalable payment acceptance platforms as well as improve the efficiency of the payment process for some of the leading web properties including Cupid.com and Sony BMG.

In addition to her payments consulting firm, PatriciaWeber.com, she is the Founder of a fast-growing merchant services company, SocialAppMerchant.

SocialAppMerchant provides custom merchant service and payment platform solutions to businesses who are launching in emerging markets;including social applications, global daily deal sites, online games and models considered outside-the-box of traditional credit card processing.

SocialAppMerchant supports both start-ups and established online businesses located worldwide.
